H0.text: Who was Manchester United manager immediately prior to Alex Ferguson. Ron Atkinson

H1.text: Who was Manchester United manager immediately prior to Alex Ferguson. Tommy Docherty

H2.text: Who was Manchester United manager immediately prior to Alex Ferguson. Dave Sexton

H3.text: Who was Manchester United manager immediately prior to Alex Ferguson. Ronglish

A4.text: Ron Atkinson was the manager of Manchester United when Alex Ferguson joined the club in November 1986.

A5.text: Ferguson was appointed manager of Manchester United after Ron Atkinson was sacked in November 1986.
